thread.title: BRIEF-U.S. Patent And Trademark Office Awards Biopharmx Patent Protection For Novel Tetracycline-Class Topical Drug Compositions

title: BRIEF-U.S. Patent And Trademark Office Awards Biopharmx Patent Protection For Novel Tetracycline-Class Topical Drug Compositions

organizations.name: patent protection for novel tetracycline-class topical drug compositions reuters

text: March 20, 2018 / 1:36 PM / Updated 6 minutes ago BRIEF-U.S. Patent And Trademark Office Awards Biopharmx Patent Protection For Novel Tetracycline-Class Topical Drug Compositions Reuters Staff March 20 (Reuters) - Biopharmx Corp: * U.S. PATENT AND TRADEMARK OFFICE AWARDS BIOPHARMX PATENT PROTECTION FOR NOVEL TETRACYCLINE-CLASS TOPICAL DRUG COMPOSITIONS * BIOPHARMX CORP - ‍PATENT PROTECTS A NEW CATEGORY OF INNOVATIVE DRUG DELIVERY SYSTEMS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
